name: Endless Ikea
description:
Endless Ikea a game about escaping Ikea. If being in Ikea wasn't making it difficult enough to escape, this one has been locked so you have to find 3 keys to be able to escape. The Game is played like most games with WASD for movement Shift and Space for Sprint and Jump and you operate the Flashlight using the mouse.

The game was made for collage purposes as a Project in our programming class the people responsible can be seen in our credits scene in game.
